
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/huangSir-devops/p/18919792" title="发布于 2025-06-08 22:10">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Jenkins概述及Linux系统中安装</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<h2 id="概述">概述</h2>
<p>官网：<a href="https://www.jenkins.io/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.jenkins.io/</a><br>
GitHub地址：<a href="https://github.com/jenkinsci/jenkins" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/jenkinsci/jenkins</a></p>
<p>Jenkins是一个用Java编写的开源的持续集成工具。在与Oracle发生争执后，项目从Hudson项目复刻。</p>
<p>Jenkins提供了软件开发的持续集成服务。它运行在Servlet容器中（例如Apache Tomcat）。它支持软件配置管理（SCM）工具（包括AccuRev SCM、CVS、Subversion、Git、Perforce、Clearcase和RTC），可以执行基于Apache Ant和Apache Maven的项目，以及任意的Shell脚本和Windows批处理命令。Jenkins的主要开发者是川口耕介。Jenkins是在MIT许可证下发布的自由软件。</p>
<p>可以通过各种手段触发构建。例如提交给版本控制系统时被触发，也可以通过类似Cron的机制调度，也可以在其他的构建已经完成时，还可以通过一个特定的URL进行请求。</p>
<h2 id="jenkins安装">Jenkins安装</h2>
<p>Jenkins是由Java编写的，安装Jenkins之前需要先安装JDK，为了配合生产环境中所需，也可以安装好tomcat，因为Jenkins是一个war包</p>
<h3 id="安装jdk">安装JDK</h3>
<blockquote>
<p>安装JDK参考这篇文章：<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/huangSir-devops/p/18919758" title="Linux环境安装OpenJDK" target="_blank">Linux环境安装OpenJDK</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p>下载JDK</p>
<pre><code>[root@master ~]# [root@master ~]# wget https://download.oracle.com/java/21/latest/jdk-21_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz
[root@master ~]# tar -xvf jdk-21_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz
# 创建软连接
[root@master ~]# ln -s /root/jdk-21.0.7 /usr/local/java
[root@master ~]# ll /usr/local/java
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 16 Jun  8 21:57 /usr/local/java -&gt; /root/jdk-21.0.7/
</code></pre>
<p>配置环境变量</p>
<pre><code>[root@master ~]# vim /etc/profile
# 根据实际安装路径修改
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/java/
export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
export CLASSPATH=.:$JAVA_HOME/lib/dt.jar:$JAVA_HOME/lib/tools.jar
 
# 加载环境变量
[root@master ~]# source /etc/profile
</code></pre>
<p>验证环境变量</p>
<pre><code>[root@master ~]# java -version
java version "21.0.7" 2025-04-15 LTS
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 21.0.7+8-LTS-245)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 21.0.7+8-LTS-245, mixed mode, sharing)
</code></pre>
<h3 id="安装tomcat">安装Tomcat</h3>
<blockquote>
<p>安装Tomcat可参考这篇文章：<a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/huangSir-devops/p/18808870#_label1_2" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/huangSir-devops/p/18808870#_label1_2</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p>tomcat官网地址：<a href="https://tomcat.apache.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://tomcat.apache.org/</a></p>
<pre><code>[root@master ~]# wget https://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-11/v11.0.7/bin/apache-tomcat-11.0.7.tar.gz
[root@master ~]# tar -xvf apache-tomcat-11.0.7.tar.gz
[root@master ~]# ln -s /root/apache-tomcat-11.0.7 /usr/local/tomcat
[root@master ~]# ll /usr/local/tomcat
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 26 Jun  8 22:04 /usr/local/tomcat -&gt; /root/apache-tomcat-11.0.7/

</code></pre>
<p>启动tomcat</p>
<pre><code>[root@master ~]# cd /usr/local/tomcat/bin/
[root@master /usr/local/tomcat/bin]# ./startup.sh
Using CATALINA_BASE:   /usr/local/tomcat
Using CATALINA_HOME:   /usr/local/tomcat
Using CATALINA_TMPDIR: /usr/local/tomcat/temp
Using JRE_HOME:        /usr/local/java/
Using CLASSPATH:       /usr/local/tomcat/bin/bootstrap.jar:/usr/local/tomcat/bin/tomcat-juli.jar
Using CATALINA_OPTS:
Tomcat started.

##检查Java进程
[root@master /usr/local/tomcat/bin]# ps -ef | grep java
root       15883       1  8 20:39 pts/0    00:00:02 /usr/local/java//bin/java -Djava.util.logging.config.file=/usr/local/tomcat/conf/logging.properties -Djava.util.logging.manager=org.apache.juli.ClassLoaderLogManager -Djdk.tls.ephemeralDHKeySize=2048 -Djava.protocol.handler.pkgs=org.apache.catalina.webresources -Dorg.apache.catalina.security.SecurityListener.UMASK=0027 -Dignore.endorsed.dirs= -classpath /usr/local/tomcat/bin/bootstrap.jar:/usr/local/tomcat/bin/tomcat-juli.jar -Dcatalina.base=/usr/local/tomcat -Dcatalina.home=/usr/local/tomcat -Djava.io.tmpdir=/usr/local/tomcat/temp org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap start
root       15915   15584  0 20:39 pts/0    00:00:00 grep --color=auto java
[root@master /usr/local/tomcat/bin]# ss -lntup | grep 8080
tcp   LISTEN 0      100                     *:8080            *:*    users:(("java",pid=15883,fd=56))
</code></pre>
<p>删除tomcat中的ROOT目录</p>
<pre><code>[root@master ~]# rm -rf /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/ROOT
</code></pre>
<h3 id="安装jenkins">安装Jenkins</h3>
<p>Jenkins支持的Java版本</p>
<blockquote>
<p>可参考这篇文章：<a href="https://www.jenkins.io/doc/book/platform-information/support-policy-java/#running-jenkins-system" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://www.jenkins.io/doc/book/platform-information/support-policy-java/#running-jenkins-system</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3468887/202506/3468887-20250608205028120-248126522.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>下载Jenkins</p>
<pre><code>[root@master ~]# wget https://github.com/jenkinsci/jenkins/releases/download/jenkins-2.479/jenkins.war
[root@master ~]# ll jenkins.war
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 91245352 Mar 22  2022 jenkins.war
</code></pre>
<p>将Jenkins复制到tomcat中</p>
<pre><code>[root@master ~]# mv jenkins.war /usr/local/tomcat/webapps/ROOT.war
</code></pre>
<h3 id="访问jenkins">访问Jenkins</h3>
<p>浏览器访问：<a href="http://10.0.0.20:8080" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">http://10.0.0.20:8080</a><br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3468887/202506/3468887-20250608205902941-2079163184.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>获取管理员密码</p>
<pre><code>[root@master ~]# cat /root/.jenkins/secrets/initialAdminPassword
a71e3ca95561417cb9af6f0d4be1b09c
</code></pre>
<p>安装插件，先跳过<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3468887/202506/3468887-20250608214426435-462121928.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>创建管理员</p>
<blockquote>
<p>我这里全部输入了admin，记录一下<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3468887/202506/3468887-20250608210121849-638178046.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
</blockquote>
<h3 id="jenkins设置中文">Jenkins设置中文</h3>
<p>Jenkins访问插件，搜索【Localization: Chinese (Simplified)】，点击安装即可</p>
<blockquote>
<p>Jenkins访问这个地址：<a href="http://10.0.0.20:8080/pluginManager/available" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">http://10.0.0.20:8080/pluginManager/available</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3468887/202506/3468887-20250608214817987-471738092.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>最后重启Jenkins即可<br>
<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/3468887/202506/3468887-20250608221031380-860026846.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>

</div>
